pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Pick textures from the palette and assign in 3D view

content.raw:
This will be fixed when we implement the menu bar for the Model Editor, because it will become like the Building Editor, where you can't simply toggle it off, you have to exit it. 

This is almost done on branch [model_editor_save](#!/osrf/gazebo/branch/model_editor_save), which will go into default. So I'm not sure about gazebo5 (exiting the model editor currently has a lot of problems).
content.html:
This will be fixed when we implement the menu bar for the Model Editor, because it will become like the Building Editor, where you can't simply toggle it off, you have to exit it.

This is almost done on branch model_editor_save, which will go into default. So I'm not sure about gazebo5 (exiting the model editor currently has a lot of problems).
